metadata.title: HCDZ Replacement Remote Control for Sony BDP-BX37 BDPBX37 148940311 RMT-B119T RMT-B119C Blu-ray BD DVD Player

description: The remote is a replacement item for Sony DVD player ,fits for various models , if you aren't sure , please let us know What's in the package: 1 X remote control , no battery and instructions includedit will work straight away when new batteries inserted
